DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFCASE : ORANGE COUNTY BUSINESS ; REAL_ESTATE
DOC.TEXT: Anaheim Conference : The Orange County chapter of the Institute of Real_Estate Management , a property-management trade group based in Chicago , will hold a conference Tuesday in Anaheim to discuss real_estate issues , including interpreting real_estate economics , new trends in shopping_centers , homes sales and how technology is affecting the business . Panel members include Jeanette Garretty , an economist with Bank of America ; Jon Fosheim , principal with Green St . Advisors in Newport Beach ; John Combs , president of O ' Donnell Property Services in Irvine ; and Bruce Weber , vice_president with Irvine Apartment Communities .
